data.name: Deadlight Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
In an apocalyptic world where existence is futile, a solitary man treks the American west coast. Survival is the measure of all. In an alternate vision of the 1980s, a mysterious disease has decimated mankind, transforming people into killer automatons. During his odyssey, Randall Wayne will find other survivors, men and women who are no more than ghostly remnants of a fading society, a flame in the desert fighting extinction...

Track List:
  1. Deadlight
  2. Lament from beyond
  3. Run Randall
  4. Death around the corner
  5. Eerie
  6. Exit from the pawn shop
  7. Wallpaper
  8. The Giant
  9. Suburbs
  10. Canabalt
  11. Last Stand
  12. Credits
  13. Alternate credits
  14. Piano Improvisation
The Soundtrack will be placed in your Deadlight folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\steamapps\common\deadlight\

data.short_description: In an apocalyptic world where existence is futile, a solitary man treks the American west coast. Survival is the measure of all. In an alternate vision of the 1980s, a mysterious disease has decimated mankind, transforming people into killer automatons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor:Processor @ 1GHZ or faster
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:350 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9 compatible sound card
